description: Episode of Series "Great Themes of Literature". Edited from Richard Brooks' film 'In Cold Blood', an adaptation of Truman Capote's novel which explores the inner life of a criminal. A sensitive probe into the factors that may have created the criminal, considering how is different from the rest of society and questions the use of the death penalty.
